name: Watch Strap 018
description:
Not many watches out there catch the heart quite as much as the Rolex GMT Master. Since its appearance in 1954, pilots, jet-setters and watch enthusiasts were smitten by it, especially with the blue/red dial version, otherwise known as the Pepsi's Dial. 
Well, how about letting those colours wrap round your wrist? So, Coca-Cola lovers, please look the other way… :)
Hand-dyed over surface of finely selected Natural Veg Tan hide, red on one side while buckle’s side went on a contrasting blue instead. Edges remained in their natural tone, hand-burnished for a smooth finish. Finally, hand-stitched finish with ivory thread. This intended colours of the strap were specially chosen to compliment the red, blue and patina of the lovely 1675.
Comes with spring Bars and 20mm Buckle at additional cost.

options.name: Blue & Red with Ivory Stitching   Buckle
Black with Blue & Red Stitching   Buckle

name: Belt 081
description:
What's arrayed on your waist as you stride through the banquet hall? A pager or mobile phone? Not cool. The slender arm of a beautiful lady? Not bad. A well-made, well-chosen belt that turns the requisite into the exquisite? Now we know who really wears the pants in the room. Two classic styles converge in this simple but beautiful belt. The timeless Conway buckle meets a touch of Brogue on the strap for the perfect finish to your classy outfit.


1.1/4” (32mm) width.

We've just did some little tweaks to our Brogue Belt design.
We extended the perforated holes thru out the whole belt and the Conway Buckle is no longer be affixed, it uses the main holes (the bigger holes) to anchor itself, thus, the buckle is moveable to lengthen or shorten the belt itself.  What it does is, one can adjust it such that belt end to sit shortly after a belt loop, thus, don't need a belt keeper to do so.
And on the buckle end, any length that's extended will eventually be hidden behind once the belt is worn.

(Read our blog for more infos)

Our new black version is hand-dyed black on Natural Veg Tan Hide. This belt is only surface dyed on both face and back, leaving the edges and holes in its natural finish. The two tone effect gives it a 3 dimensional feel. And this black version will be spotted with a Solid Brass Conway Buckle.

Just drop us a note on your required waist size, and we'll give you ample length to work with.

options.name: Hand Dyed Black with Solid Brass Buckle

name: Brogue Watch Strap 016
description: This 016 strap is designed as a single strap construction, some what in-between a Nato and a Bund. One would require to remove the push-pin in order to install the watch head itself onto this strap. Available in Hand Dyed Black, Red or keeping it Natural on Italian Veg Tan Hide. As all our items, the 016 straps are hand crafted, from hand punched brogue essence, stitching to burnishing of edges. This strap would take watch head 40 to 45 mm measuring from end of the 2 push pins. Currently comes in 20/20 configurations with buckle, while we are exploring a 22/22 option (depending on demands).

options.name: Hand Dyed Black on Natural Veg Tan
Hand Dyed Red on Natural Veg Tan

name: Watch Strap 017
description:
The 017 strap's surface are hand dyed in CopperTone. Edges are all beveled and burnished to shine by hand, creating a 2 tone effect, giving the strap a 3 dimensional feel.

20/20 ~ Fits Rolex Submarina or GMT or similar
21/21 ~ Fits Rolex Deepseas
24/24 ~ Fits Panerai or similar
Hand dyed European Natural Veg Tan Hide
Spotted with Tab Keeper and Double Cross Stitches.
4-6 mm thick
Please do indicate if you want the Pin tube to be installed with your strap. (For 20/20 version, the original Rolex spring bar is much thicker, thus not advised to have the pin tube unless its used with standard aftermarket spring bar).

Buckle shown not included.

name: iPhone Sleeve 035
description: If you had the most beautifully-sculpted body – smooth, slender, sensual – how would you preserve it, yet show it off? Well, that's probably what your iPhone thinks about all the time… and gets depressed about when you snap on one of those solid covers. Give it something classy yet comfortable to slip in and out of with this handcrafted phone sleeve. 2-3oz natural veg tan hide. Hand dyed in Copper Tan and edges burnished  to shine. Pig suede inner lining in black. Brogue-styled pocket slot for cards, bills or that-girl-down-the-counter's number. Designed for iPhones and similar-sized models.

name: iPhone5 Sleeve 036
description:
If you had the most beautifully-sculpted body – smooth, slender, sensual – how would you preserve it, yet show it off? Well, that's probably what your iPhone thinks about all the time… and gets depressed about when you snap on one of those solid covers. Give it something classy yet comfortable to slip in and out of with this handcrafted phone sleeve. 

This svelte sleeve is hand crafted with one of the finest leather in town.
The Horween Chromexcel Hide. Very smooth, soft and silky to the touch. Edges are hand burnish and sealed. Lovely to work with too!

name: Shoehorn 071
description:
If you're of some standing in the world, it'll take more than the ordinary to fill your shoes. So we're prepared something just that much more special. Our shoehorns, handcrafted with top quality leather and styled in classic, impeccable Brogue, lend a well-heeled touch.


Natural Veg Tan Hide
Brown LambHide 
Stainless Steel under the skin
7 ½ inches long

options.name: Natural Veg Tan with White Stitching / Natural Edge
LambHide Brown with Black Stitching / Dark Edge

name: Wallet 051
description:
Slim and sleek minimalist design 
1 single piece of leather 
2 card compartments (hold about 10 cards in total) 
1 half compartment (good for receipts) 
1 full compartment (for legal tender)

The Charging Bull is Wall Street's icon of financial progress and prosperity, guarding the big money that flies around there. Now, get a piece of it to protect yours. Well, the hide of its living counterpart, at least. Same thing, no?

name: Cam Strap 021
description:
Ergonomic design to fit round the wrist 
Suede under layer for more comfort 
More secure 2nd catch point 
Fits most compact cameras

Think of all the times you've seen a beautiful thing sullied by an ugly add-on that just had to be there "for practical purposes". Like classy cars with boring ol' stock rims. Or supermodels with clothes. You won't have to sacrifice beauty for safety with these classy camera straps. Real leather, real top quality production, the real deal. Fits most cameras.

name: Eyewear 031
description:
Retiles printed hide 
Lined with plush goat suede 
With nose bridge rest 
Sam Brown style stud closure

When off duty, sunnies loiter in the strangest of places, hanging from collars, behind necks or even perching atop heads or *gasp* car dashboards. Give them the home they deserve with these dainty yet tough, sleek yet rugged cases.

name: Eyewear 032
description:
With nose bridge rest
Sam Brown style stud closure 

Like the older brother 031, this case offers without the inner suede layer.

name: Tote 061
description:
Copper Tan Hide 
Smooth black handle straps (550 mm) 
Holds up to A3 size document (375x420x65 mm) 
Inner pocket 
Front pocket

The ubiquitous tote bag has endured a turbulent history — a fashionable stuff-holder that became a cheap supermarket gimmick and the giveaway of choice at cheesy events. We're returning it to its Sartorialist-worthy roots with this all-leather interpretation.

name: Watch Strap 011
description:
Fits Bell&Ross 01/03 Aviation series
24/24
4-6 mm thick
Pin tube with additional $0 (absorbed)(please indicate if you want the pin to be included)
Buckle shown not included

The watch has come a long way, from being simply an instrument for measuring time to taking pride of place as the centrepiece on every wrist. Add a classy spin with these meticulously and perfectly handcrafted straps, specially designed for Panerai and Bell & Ross models, and you might find yourself clock-watching a lot more…

Natural Veg Tan with White Stitching Dark Edge
